channel.title: Discover — your news, your stories, your later life | Age UK
channel.description: This feed displays the 6 most recent media releases from Age UK

item.title: Creating connections: the Age UK supporter engagement team
item.description: Marie from Age UK’s Supporter Engagement team discusses the life-changing impact of our supporters.

item.title: The making of Age UK's sex, relationships and intimacy information guide
item.description: Why Age UK has written a new information guide on sex, relationships and intimacy in later life.

item.title: Supporting older people's health in 2026
item.description: Age UK's Health Influencing team discusses updates to the NHS 10 Year Plan and what to expect in 2026.

item.title: How Lesley has stayed self-sufficient
item.description: Lesley shares how the Age UK Advice Line supported her to enjoy later life.

item.title: Margaret's resilience
item.description: Margaret shares how Age UK helped her rediscover her peace of mind and herself.

item.title: Understanding AI
item.description: We answer your questions about artificial intelligence and what it means for you.

item.title: Changing how we age at Christmas
item.description: Age UK Lewisham & Southwark's Christmas party brings together older people from the community for a lively celebration.

item.title: 5 ways to help older people struggling with loneliness this winter
item.description: The Age UK Health Influencing team outlines simple ways for professionals to help ease loneliness this winter.

item.title: Shining a spotlight on domestic abuse in older people
item.description: New statistics reveal the scale of domestic abuse among older people, and how we can all work to raise awareness.

item.title: Tackling the crisis of corridor care
item.description: The Age UK Health Influencing team discusses the impact of corridor care, and what can be done to fix it.

item.title: Julian's epic journey
item.description: When Age UK helped support Julian's mother, he decided to cycle the length of the UK to fundraise for our services.

item.title: The life cycle of Dr Norman Lazarus
item.description: We speak to Dr Norman Lazarus about his recent bike ride for Age UK and getting the most out of later life.

item.title: Brenda's story
item.description: Brenda shares her story and explains how an intergenerational friendship has made a life-changing difference.

item.title: Key findings from our Ageing While Black report
item.description: Age UK's Ageing While Black report examines how people of Black Caribbean heritage are experiencing getting older.

item.title: Supporting older people to stay well this winter
item.description: The Age UK Health Influencing team answers your questions about the best ways to stay healthy this winter.

item.title: Wit and wisdom: inside an Age UK comedy night
item.description: We attended Age UK Bristol’s first comedy gig to discover why new events like this are so important.

item.title: A day of celebrations
item.description: This Silver Sunday, we set off on a trip around some of the capital’s best events to celebrate older people.

item.title: Elaine reflects on Black History Month
item.description: This Black History Month, Age UK storyteller Elaine discusses keeping connected with her culture.

item.title: The State of Health and Care of Older People in England 2025
item.description: Our new report examines how social care system changes in the past 10 years are affecting older people's health.

item.title: Keeping up with changes to the benefit system
item.description: We answer your questions about recent changes to the Winter Fuel Payment, benefits rates, and more.
